/hr/oci--ghcr.io-bjw-s-helm-app-template.title: home-assistant helm release
/hr/oci--ghcr.io-bjw-s-helm-app-template.name: home-assistant
/hr/oci--ghcr.io-bjw-s-helm-app-template.doc:
Home Assistant

Home Assistant is a home automation platform that has many integrations. It can be used to control lights, fans, thermostats, cameras, and many other devicesn

/hr/oci--ghcr.io-bjw-s-helm-app-template.title: immich-machine-learning helm release
/hr/oci--ghcr.io-bjw-s-helm-app-template.name: immich-machine-learning
/hr/oci--ghcr.io-bjw-s-helm-app-template.doc:
Immich is a self-hosted photo and video backup solution.

For immich, there are multiple helm deployments:

  • immich-web
  • immich-server
  • immich-typesense
  • immich-machine-learning (this one)
  • immich-microservices

For redis and postgres, there are multiple helm charts:

  • Redis: app-template/redis, bitnami/redis
  • PostgreSQL: operator cloudnative-pg/cloudnative-pg, bitnami bitnami/postgresql
